llm_res.rule: name function should return the name of the token.
transfer function should throw if the message caller's account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
transferFrom function should throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
approve function allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
